'''The Cat's Affection''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] that takes place in [[Seirai Island]], [[Inazuma]]. It is gated over 4 in real life days (3 server resets), and requires the completion of the [[World Quest]] "[[Neko Is a Cat: Shrine Recipe]]"

==Procedure==
Feed {{Item|Invigorating Kitty Meal|x=1|25}} to the cat on the paw-shaped rock once a day, after the server resets, the kitten will change from one toe to the next one, until it is on the last one, where it will spawn a [[Chests#Precious|Precious Chest]] and award the ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievement "[[A Cat's Gift]]" upon feeding it.
